reviewText: This movie was recommended to by several soldiers.  You can't get better then this.  The Dove symbol tells me it is safe for family viewing.
Saw this movie at a theater and would recommend it to all. It was so meaningful and heart rending. A sad in the beginning but also a feel good movie

This movie is all about Americans allowing our freedoms to erode and standing up for what is right!  Loved this movie.  You will clap, cry and cheer!  A must see by all Americans that love our Freedoms.
good message
Excellent Movie
good

This is really good.  All Christians have to stop sitting back and letting others say what we can do and not do.  We have slept through prayer being taken out of school, abortion being allowed and now others have a right to their beliefs and Christians are re-educated for theirs.
one of my favorite movies
Uplifting and patriotic film. It shows just how fragile our freedoms are and we should not take them for granted.
I loved how this encouraged people to stand up for what they believe without causing harm to anyone.
I love this movie, it is good. It is a must watch movie. It really enlightens you about what is happening in today's world. It will tug at your heart strings. It has a happy ending.
Something everyone should watch, sure hits home in these troubled times, am buying 4 gifts.
Great movie
EVERY ONE IN AMERICA SHOULD SEE THIS MOVIE. IT WOUD BRING BACK OUR PATRIOTIC SPIRIT.

Well done!! A must see by every one who is an American or calls this their home or refuge!

All it takes to bring down our freedom is for good men to do nothing. Will you be guilty of fighting for our freedoms the all of our veterans fought for and so many died for? Or will you be guilty of doing nothing as their voices and blood cry out from their graves asking that their death and what they fought for NOT be in vain...?
STAND up - use every Last ounce of Courage!
Love this movie! Great for the entire family! Thanks.
Everyone should see this movie!
Awesome, inspiring, & encouraging. We the people have spoken & will stand on our convictions & Constitutional Rights. A must see & share w/others.
Excellent.

I absolutely love this movie and recommended to the pastor at my church because I know he will really like this movie too. awesome that it is faith based too. need to make more like this movie.
Wonderful movie to remind us how our religious freedoms have eroded and how sometimes it is just because we don't stand up and stand for the rights men and women died to give us.
love this movie

I loved this movie!  I will never tire of watching it.  It is an inspirational movie that tugs at your heart strings.

This movie really tells it like it is. About the only people who won't be moved are those who don't believe in the American dream and Christianity. If there were 10 stars to fill in I'd still fill 'em all in!

best damn movie I've seen in a while Five stars!
A really good, patriotic movie and a great reminder at Christmas.

I enjoyed this movie because I am a Christian with a lot of nostalgic values retained from my childhood.  For me, this is the best Christmas movie, even surpassing "It's A Wonderful Life".  For those who are Christians, I am certain you will be wonderfully surprised and enjoy it.  I am not able to vouch for those of you in other faiths.
Heroic fantastic story

All I can say is that every American and Christian needs to see this movie.  It is a very inspiring movie.  So MERRY CHRISTMAS AND GOD BLESS AMERICA....and THANK YOU VETERANS FOR OUR FREEDOM!!!

This is an entertaining movie which is current in presenting our rights as citizens.  It covers thoughts on the military and on the attempt to do away with Christmas.  It is a wake-up call for those who wish to celebrate the true meaning of Christmas and how we can take a stand.  Our family enjoys it and has watched it a few times.  We also have shown it to friends.
Great movie - makes us think about what we stand for!!

One of the best movies I have viewed!
 I believe every household in America should set down and watch this awesome movie!!!
Excellent movie- well worth watching!!!!!

This movie should be shown in every high school in America. Good plot, settings and I loved the message. I guess my only regret is that I wish it had given an explanation re the phrase "separation of church and state." This phrase is nowhere in the US Constitution. It was first articulated by Thomas Jefferson who explained to a group of Anabaptists that there is to be a separation only for the sake of not allowing our government to establish a "state religion." We each are free to choose our own faith or no faith. We are guaranteed that freedom!
LOVED THIS MOVIE !!!
Very good movie and great for family to watch together.
I am not into these kinds of films; bought it because my friends were in it -

This movie should be a required viewing for everyone, especially young people.  It is the story of our freedoms being stolen right out from us, and a man who decides to take back one freedom- that of celebrating Christmas .  This is a family friendly movie with a very important message.  Our men and women have fought and died for the freedoms we enjoy and the left wing wants taken away.
Elevates care to others by being responsible for yourself
NEED TO SEE so we can get our priorities back in order.
REALLY GOOD MOVIE
